title: Whats the point of even having armor
body: 300 armor 300 magic resist 4k health and i still get 4 shot by YI with one alpha. doesn't make any sense. this game is fucking stupid. he only had 4 kill and 6 assist. 11 deaths. im not saying he is broken. he does have some counterplay. but there is no reason he should aa 4 times and kill me

replies.body:
That is the entire point of yi. He AAs people with tons of true/% damage and cannot do anything else at all.

This is why he sucks and is never seen outside of bronze V, blind pick and ARAM. Anyone with hard, accurate CC stomps him.
i used to laugh when vs a yi as rammus. now i dread it because his e dmg is so overpowered
the issue is yi's true dmg is absurd. armor is SUPPOSED to counter him. but armor is irrelevant when you have on hit true dmg and double strikes
its 4 aa and an alpha. the only other thing is his botrk

1 Yi alpha strike doesn't do that much damage.

Anyways I just had an ARAM where the other team's mal was able to carry his team against mine which had 3 ADCs.  I was on Shyvana so my CC options were limited.  So armor does work when there's too much meat to easily peel.
What you're saying seems mathematically impossible. You got a video? Or at least link to game history?
Video proof or it didn't happen. I wanna see the one shot alpha strike.
